title: WHAT FONT IS THIS?
content:
Please help me. What font is used in this picture?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [nicole font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425221825/http:/typophile.com/files/nicole%20font.jpg) | 62.52 KB |
author: whatthefont

comments.content:
Capistrano looks good for the lc parts... not so sure about the uc and ampersand.
